meanings.sent1: That putz always forgets his keys.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to that putz, he doesn't know anything.
meanings.sent3: The putz tried to juggle eggs and failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: He's such a putz, he couldn't find his way out of a paper bag.
meanings.sent5: The village was full of putzes who couldn't tie their own shoes.

meanings.definition: To waste time or engage in foolish behavior.
meanings.sent1: Stop putzing around and finish your homework.
meanings.sent2: I tend to putz on my phone instead of doing chores.
meanings.sent3: He putzed away the afternoon playing video games.
meanings.sent4: She putzed through life without a care in the world.
meanings.sent5: The child putzed with his toys instead of cleaning his room.

meanings.definition: To decorate or arrange in a showy or flashy manner.
meanings.sent1: She putzed the room with glitter and sparkles.
meanings.sent2: The tree was putzed with colorful lights for the holidays.
meanings.sent3: He putzed his car with so many stickers, it looked like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The cake was putzed with extravagant frosting designs.
meanings.sent5: The stage was putzed with elaborate props for the play.
